title: Synthesis of different organic ammonium-based bismuth iodide perovskites for photodetection application
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10113-10119
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00173G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Amr Elattar, Cassie Duclos, Franchesca Bellevu, Tarik Dickens, Okenwa Okoli
Four different primary, secondary, and tertiary amine-based bismuth perovskites have shown good potential towards photodetection application with the highest photo-detectivity of branched primary amine-based devices compared to other devices.
